name: Twisting Tiles
description:
Twist your way to the end of each level!

Made in ~4.5 total hours for Trijam #154 in HaxeFlixel using the Echo physics library. I definitely did go over the time limit, but I just wanted to put more polish on my first game jam game.

Arrow Keys to Move

R to Twist the level

ASSETS

  • Spikes adapted from https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer
  • Sounds from SFXR
